// tick dependency solutions 
// Given G = <N,E> (nodes, and edges)
// ⊆ ∉ ∈

A = Ø
THING(S)
  for n ∈ { x | x ∈ N,  }
    s = S ∪ {n}
    if s ∈ A


// 
FUNC(S,n,a)
  if a is a subset of any solution in S
    return Ø
  p = { x | x ∈ } // all postsets of 
  k = { x | x ∈ N, x ∉ n⋅, x ∉ a }
  if |k| = 0
    return a
  s = Ø
  for m ∈ k
    b = a ∪ {m}
    s = s ∪ { FUNC(S,m,b) ∪ {n} }
  return s

//
MAIN()
  S = Ø
  for n ∈ N
    S = S ∪ FUNC(S,n,{n})
  return S
